ing: 1 (24 ounce) jar chunky salsa, mild, medium, or spicy, as desired
1 (15.25 ounce) can Del MonteÂ® Whole Kernel Corn, well drained
1/4 cup chopped fresh cilantro or sliced green onions
1 small avocado - peeled, pitted and diced
3/4 cup canned black beans, rinsed and drained
des: "The vibrant combination of sweet yellow corn with zesty salsa is perfect as-is or with any of the optional add-ins.Â  Try pan roasting the corn for a simple flavor twist that will impress friends and family."
ins:
Stir together salsa and corn.
Stir in any of the add-ins, as desired.
Chill at least 2 hours before serving with tortilla chips, sweet potato chips, pita chips, bell pepper strips or sliced cucumber.
